org.pepstock.charba.client.items

Class AxisMarginsItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.GenericJavaScriptObject
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.BaseItem
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.AxisMarginsItem

  • public class AxisMarginsItem
extends BaseItem
    JavaScript object which contains the margins sizes of an axis.
    This object reflects the object created by CHART.JS and is provided to Axis callbacks.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
